events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn’t fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer’s request for money back.
Customer service agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn at all?
The order number is 45321789. The jacket is brand new, I haven’t worn it, just tried it on once and it doesn’t fit.
Thank you for the info. We can process your refund immediately once you ship the jacket back to us with the prepaid return label.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back today using the label you provide.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund came through yesterday. Thank you very much for the smooth process and your help.
We are happy to have resolved your issue. Closing this case now, but feel free to contact us anytime in the future.
